Plan: 1 to add, 1 to drop.

Summary by type:
  views: 1 to add, 1 to drop

Views:
  - active_employees
  + active_employees

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW active_employees RESTRICT;

CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW IF NOT EXISTS active_employees AS
 SELECT
    id,
    name,
    salary,
    status
   FROM employees
  WHERE status = 'active';
